headline: What Analysts Think Is Changing Samsara’s Edge Against Competitors
summary: Samsara’s latest narrative update comes with a slightly higher fair value estimate, nudging the price target from $48.20 to about $49.72 as modestly stronger growth expectations are baked into new models. This shift is underpinned by research pointing to faster net new ARR momentum and a more confident medium term revenue trajectory, even as the discount rate edges up from roughly 8.43% to 8.47% to reflect a marginally higher required return. Stay tuned to see how you can track these evolving...
